amendment.description: An amendment numbered 47 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to require the FAA Administrator to make an objective, independent assessment of a NOTAM request when the request comes from outside the FAA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 214 - 219 (Roll no. 348).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Issa.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 214 - 219 (Roll no. 348).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
